New Records: Fakhar Zaman scored 126 not out off 81 balls
Rachin Ravindra scored his third World Cup century
Kane Williamson scored 95 runs before being dismissed
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and chose to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's win was a morale booster for their World Cup campaign
The match outcome was significant for their progression
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Pakistan's second win in the World Cup
Weather and pitch conditions affected the match
Others: Pakistan maintained their points and tied with New Zealand
